answers.answer: Hi!Well, small fiber neuropathy can be idiopathic. However to reach at this conclusion, all other causes of neuropathy will have to be ruled out. Small fiber peripheral neuropathy can be due to nutritional deficiency, diabetes, hypothyroidism, Lyme disease, Lupus, vasculitis, Sjögren's syndrome, sarcoidosis, Celiac disease, amyloidosis, Fabry disease, HIVand alcoholism. Take care!
